pullrequest.title: Initial layout for being able to execute transport command line commands with `ign`.

content.raw: I thought about this to be consistent with `gz` but the caveats are that the `-l` looks like an optional argument and in this case we need a mandatory positional argument after `topic`. The `-l` notation can also give the impression that you can use multiple options. However, only one sub-command is allowed at a time. I'm totally opened to change it if we believe it's still better.
